name: Deceased Racehorse Extravaganza V1.0
description:
Ever wondered what happens to dead racehorses?

Wonder no more person reading this page, hop in and discover the party of your afterlife! 

Features:

  • A (very) short walk through the racehorse afterlife!
  • Rare apples!
  • Janky student project bugs!

All jokes aside, this was made in ~2 weeks as part of my course. This is the second game i've made, so any feedback would be welcome! 

Feedback (Google Forms):

https://forms.gle/c66NtmyJBkW5xe66A

Known Bugs:

  • Chat dialogue becomes stuck on screen if player moves while in dialogue. To fix, press the windows key, and while you're out of the game click back in onto the "Leave" button.
